original_text: These preparations having thus been made, the priests go regularly into the first section, performing their ritual duties,
korean_text: 이 모든 것을 이같이 예비하였으니 제사장들이 항상 첫 장막에 들어가 섬기는 예식을 행하고

sentences.original_text: These preparations having thus been made,
the priests go regularly into the first section,
